name: contact
content:
Let's get in touch!

If you're old-fashioned vintage feel free to email me at: dansvgNot today, you pesky robots!@gmail.com.

My GitHub page shows a few things I've worked on, or contributed to. I'm quite fond of the site, as it lets me see some cool projects.

Feel free to get in touch with me on LinkedIn, especially if we've worked together.

I don't use the service daily, but you can find me on Twitter from time to time.
